title: De-dollarization: Is the US dollar losing its dominance? (2025)
summary:
This Global Research article from 2025 argues that the US dollar is experiencing an accelerated decline in its global dominance, driven by the ongoing trend of de-dollarization.

The piece contends that US foreign policy, particularly the "weaponization" of the dollar through sanctions, has compelled numerous nations to seek alternative payment and reserve currencies to mitigate their vulnerability. Key drivers include the rise of multilateral blocs like BRICS+, actively promoting trade in local currencies and exploring common payment mechanisms. The article highlights the increasing adoption of the Chinese Yuan in international trade and central bank reserves, alongside a broader diversification strategy by central banks away from dollar assets towards gold and other currencies.

Further undermining confidence are persistent US economic vulnerabilities, such as high national debt and inflationary pressures. The emergence of digital currencies and new cross-border payment systems also presents long-term challenges to the dollar's traditional rails. While the article acknowledges the dollar's enduring strengths, it concludes that the cumulative effect of these factors is irrevocably shifting the global financial landscape towards a more multipolar system, gradually eroding Washington's economic leverage and reshaping international finance.
chinese_title: 去美元化：美元正在失去主导地位？(2025)
chinese_summary:
这篇2025年的全球研究文章指出，受持续的“去美元化”趋势推动，美元在全球的主导地位正在加速衰落。

文章认为，美国的对外政策，特别是通过制裁“武器化”美元的做法，已迫使众多国家寻求替代的支付和储备货币，以降低其脆弱性。主要驱动因素包括金砖国家+等多边集团的崛起，它们积极推动本币贸易，并探索共同支付机制。文章强调，人民币在国际贸易和央行储备中的使用日益增加，同时各国央行也采取了更广泛的多元化战略，将资产从美元转向黄金和其他货币。

进一步削弱信心的还有美国持续存在的经济脆弱性，如高额国债和通胀压力。数字货币和新型跨境支付系统的出现也对美元的传统体系构成了长期挑战。尽管文章承认美元的持久优势，但它总结认为，这些因素的累积效应正在不可逆转地将全球金融格局推向一个更加多极化的体系，逐步削弱华盛顿的经济影响力并重塑国际金融。

title: EU–INC – A new pan-European legal entity
summary:
The EU–INC is a proposed pan-European legal entity aimed at creating "One Europe. One Standard." for startups. It seeks to overcome national fragmentation and reduce regulatory burdens that hinder European companies from expanding and raising money across the continent, similar to the US C-corp model.

Key features include a central EU-level registry, standardized investment documents, and EU-wide stock options, while maintaining local taxes and employment rules. The initiative has strong political backing, with President Ursula von der Leyen, Justice Commissioner McGrath, and Startup Commissioner Zaharieva actively involved. A dedicated working group within the Commission is addressing it, and both the European Council and Parliament have shown interest, referring to it as the "28th regime."

The roadmap outlines a legislative proposal from the European Commission in Q1 2026, with final implementation targeted for 2027. Public support is crucial to influence this process. Individuals are encouraged to contact national politicians and the press to advocate for the EU–INC's necessity, as laws still require agreement from all 27 member states. Spreading awareness on social media and through publications is also vital. The proposal has already garnered attention from media outlets like Techcrunch, CNBC, and Euractive.
chinese_title: EU–INC – 一个新的泛欧洲法律实体
chinese_summary:
欧盟–INC是一项拟议中的泛欧洲法律实体，旨在为初创企业打造“一个欧洲。一个标准。”它旨在克服国家层面的碎片化，并减少阻碍欧洲公司在整个大陆扩张和融资的监管负担，类似于美国的C型公司模式。

主要特点包括一个欧盟层面的中央登记处、标准化的投资文件和欧盟范围内的股票期权，同时保留地方税收和就业规则。该倡议得到了强大的政治支持，欧盟委员会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩、司法委员麦格拉斯和初创企业委员扎哈里耶娃积极参与其中。欧盟委员会内部的一个专门工作组正在处理此事，欧洲理事会和欧洲议会都对此表示了兴趣，并称其为“第28个制度”。

路线图概述了欧盟委员会将于2026年第一季度提出一项立法提案，最终实施目标是2027年。公众支持对于影响这一进程至关重要。鼓励个人联系本国政客和媒体，宣传欧盟–INC的必要性，因为法律仍需所有27个成员国同意。在社交媒体和出版物上宣传意识也至关重要。该提案已获得Techcrunch、CNBC和Euractive等媒体的关注。

title: Anthropic's original take home assignment open sourced
summary:
Anthropic has open-sourced a version of its original performance take-home assignment, which evolved significantly as its Claude models began to outperform humans. Initially a 4-hour task, it was later reduced to a 2-hour challenge with a faster code baseline after Claude Opus 4 surpassed most human performances.

The currently open-sourced version reverts to the slowest starter code, providing better debugging tools, and challenges users to beat Claude Opus 4.5's performance without time limits. Performance is measured in clock cycles, with lower numbers indicating better optimization. Benchmarks show Claude Opus 4.5 achieving impressive results, ranging from 1790 cycles in a casual session to 1363 cycles in an improved compute harness, significantly faster than the human baseline.

Anthropic encourages individuals who can optimize the code below 1487 cycles (beating Claude Opus 4.5's launch best) to email their performance recruiting team with their code and resume. Achieving results near the undisclosed "best human performance ever" would be particularly impressive, serving as a potential pathway for hiring consideration. The thresholds for impressing Anthropic may be updated with future model releases.
chinese_title: Anthropic 的原版实操题开源
chinese_summary:
Anthropic已开源了其最初的性能带回家作业的一个版本，该作业随着其Claude模型开始超越人类而显著演变。最初是一个4小时的任务，在Claude Opus 4超越了大多数人类表现后，它被缩短为2小时的挑战，并采用了更快的代码基线。

目前开源的版本恢复到最慢的起始代码，提供了更好的调试工具，并挑战用户在没有时间限制的情况下超越Claude Opus 4.5的性能。性能以时钟周期衡量，数字越低表示优化越好。基准测试显示，Claude Opus 4.5取得了令人印象深刻的成绩，从随意会话中的1790个周期到改进计算框架中的1363个周期，显著快于人类基线。

Anthropic鼓励那些能将代码优化到1487个周期以下（超越Claude Opus 4.5发布时的最佳成绩）的个人，将他们的代码和简历发送给其性能招聘团队。达到接近未公开的“史上最佳人类表现”的成绩将会尤其令人印象深刻，这可能会成为被考虑录用的途径。未来随着模型的发布，Anthropic可能更新其印象深刻的门槛。

title: I'm addicted to being useful
summary:
The author, a staff software engineer, finds immense joy in his job despite the current industry pressures, attributing his motivation primarily to an "addiction to being useful." He describes an almost physical discomfort when encountering a problem he can solve, followed by deep satisfaction upon its resolution, especially when others rely on him. This personal "dysfunction," he argues, makes him perfectly suited for the problem-solving nature of software engineering.

Drawing a parallel to Akaky Akaievich from Gogol's "The Overcoat"—a man who loved his menial job—the author explains that, like a working dog, he is driven by the intrinsic satisfaction of the work itself, not just external rewards. He believes this internal compulsion, whether for usefulness, puzzle-solving, or control, is a common driver for many software engineers.

His professional advice often stems from how he strategically channels this need for usefulness to achieve material rewards and avoid exploitation, emphasizing impact over merely clearing tickets or working for unrespected individuals. The author concludes by distinguishing these powerful internal compulsions from external motivators like money or power, urging software engineers to understand and effectively harness their own intrinsic drives.
chinese_title: 我沉迷于有用
chinese_summary:
作者是一名资深软件工程师，尽管当前行业压力巨大，他仍对自己的工作充满极大的乐趣，将动力主要归因于一种“有用成瘾”。他描述道，当遇到一个他能解决的问题时，会感到一种近乎生理上的不适，而问题解决后，则会感到深深的满足，尤其当他人依赖于他时。他认为，这种个人的“癖好”使他完美地适应了软件工程解决问题的本质。

作者将自己比作果戈理小说《外套》中的阿卡基·阿卡基耶维奇——一个热爱自己卑微工作的人——解释说，他就像一只工作犬，被工作本身的内在满足感所驱动，而不仅仅是外部奖励。他相信，这种内在的冲动，无论是对有用性、解谜还是掌控的追求，都是许多软件工程师的普遍驱动力。

他的职业建议往往源于他如何战略性地引导这种对有用性的需求，以获得物质回报并避免被剥削，他强调影响力而非仅仅是处理工单或为不受尊重的人工作。作者最后总结道，将这些强大的内在冲动与金钱或权力等外部激励因素区分开来，并敦促软件工程师理解并有效利用他们自身的内在驱动力。

title: A 26,000-year astronomical monument hidden in plain sight (2019)
summary:
The Hoover Dam's Monument Plaza features a hidden astronomical monument on its terrazzo floor, designed by Oskar J. W. Hansen and completed in 01936. This celestial map utilizes the Earth's 25,772-year axial precession – the slow 'wobble' that shifts the celestial North Pole and thus our North Star (e.g., Polaris, Thuban for ancient Egyptians, Vega in 12,000 years) – to mark the dam's creation date.

Author Alexander Rose, interested due to its connection to the Long Now's 10,000 Year Clock, investigated this obscure monument, finding little public documentation and the artist's own statements to be convoluted. With help from dam historian Emme Woodward, Rose obtained original blueprints and historical images (found by searching "Safety Island," its name during construction) to decipher its technical intent.

The plaza's central flagpole acts as the center for the precession circle, with the terrazzo depicting the precise angle of Polaris (the then-North Star) for the dam's opening date, alongside positions of visible planets and bright stars. This intricate design allows the dam's completion date to be pinpointed to within a day, forming a lasting, yet often overlooked and misunderstood, celestial clock.
chinese_title: 大隐于市的两万六千年天文遗迹 (2019)
chinese_summary:
胡佛水坝的纪念广场上，其水磨石地板设有一个隐藏的天文纪念碑，由奥斯卡·J·W·汉森设计并于1936年建成。这幅星图利用地球25,772年的轴向进动——即那种缓慢的“摆动”，它会使天北极以及我们的北极星（例如，现在的北极星、古埃及时的天枢、12,000年后的织女星）发生移动——来标记大坝的建成日期。

作者亚历山大·罗斯因其与“长时”组织万年钟的关联而产生兴趣，对这座鲜为人知的纪念碑进行了调查，发现公开文献资料甚少，且艺术家本人的陈述也晦涩难懂。在大坝历史学家埃米·伍德沃德的帮助下，罗斯获得了原始蓝图和历史图片（通过搜索其在施工期间的名称“安全岛”找到），以解读其技术意图。

广场中央的旗杆作为进动圆的中心，水磨石地板描绘了大坝启用日期当天北极星（当时的北极星）的精确角度，以及可见行星和亮星的位置。这种精巧的设计使大坝的竣工日期能够精确到一天之内，形成了一个持久但常被忽视和误解的天文钟。

title: The Overcomplexity of the Shadcn Radio Button
summary:
The author details a surprising encounter with radio button complexity while updating styles in a web app. Expecting a simple HTML `<input type="radio">`, they discovered the project utilized Shadcn's `<RadioGroup>` and `<RadioGroupItem>` components. These components, unexpectedly intricate with 45 lines of code and dependencies (including an icon library for a simple circle), are built upon Radix Primitives.

Further investigation revealed Radix's implementation forgoes the native radio input. Instead, it renders a `<button>` with an SVG circle, relying on ARIA attributes (`role="radio"`) to convey its semantic meaning. This approach, the author notes, violates the "First Rule of ARIA use," which prioritizes native HTML elements. A hidden native `<input type="radio">` is only present if the component is within a form.

The author argues this over-engineering is unnecessary, as styling native radio buttons has become simple using CSS properties like `appearance: none`, `::before` pseudo-elements, and `:checked` pseudo-classes—requiring no JavaScript or external dependencies. While acknowledging the appeal of component libraries, the article critiques this pattern of abstracting simple browser features. The author concludes that such overcomplexity, even for a basic radio button, contributes to increased cognitive load, more bugs, larger JavaScript bundles, and ultimately, worse website performance.
chinese_title: Shadcn 单选按钮的过于复杂
chinese_summary:
作者详细描述了在更新一个网络应用样式时，意外遭遇单选按钮复杂性的一次经历。原本以为会是一个简单的 HTML `<input type="radio">`，结果发现项目使用了 Shadcn 的 `<RadioGroup>` 和 `<RadioGroupItem>` 组件。这些组件出乎意料地复杂，包含 45 行代码和多重依赖（甚至一个简单的圆圈都需要图标库），并且它们是基于 Radix Primitives 构建的。

进一步调查显示，Radix 的实现放弃了原生的单选输入框。它转而渲染一个带有 SVG 圆圈的 `<button>` 元素，并依赖 ARIA 属性（`role="radio"`）来传达其语义。作者指出，这种做法违反了“ARIA 使用的第一条规则”，即优先使用原生的 HTML 元素。只有当该组件位于表单内部时，才会存在一个隐藏的原生 `<input type="radio">`。

作者认为这种过度工程化是不必要的，因为使用 `appearance: none` 等 CSS 属性、`::before` 伪元素和 `:checked` 伪类，原生单选按钮的样式设置已经变得非常简单，无需 JavaScript 或外部依赖。尽管承认组件库的吸引力，文章仍批评这种抽象简单浏览器功能的模式。作者总结道，即使对于一个基本的单选按钮，这种过度复杂性也会导致认知负荷增加、bug 增多、JavaScript 包体积变大，并最终导致网站性能下降。
